summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5664 for the improvement of West 56th Street, from 32nd Avenue Northwest to 34th Avenue Northwest; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 74950, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
